name: Sakamata Chloe 沙花叉クロヱ / Hololive
description:
Be sure to read it.

First of all I write English through a translator, so please understand.


LoRA weight 0.6 is best.

I avoided using trigger words when creating this LoRA for quality and ease of costume swapping.

For Sakamata Chloe's normal outfit, this meant that she could freely change her mask, hair length, and the presence or absence of a jacket.


I also attach a suggested prompt to each outfit.

I apologize if the length of the prompt makes you uncomfortable.

1. Normal outfit (Medum hair ↔ Long hair)

prompt: 1girl, solo, red_eyes, sakamata chloe, garter straps, black fingerless gloves, torn thighhighs, grey hair, multicolored hair, plaid skirt, streaked hair, cleavage, x hair ornament, black hair, red skirt, black collar, white camisole, medium breasts, braid, black_belt, medium hair, black jacket

2. Normal outfit (hood up)

Add hood_up, plaid bow at the 1. Normal outfit's prompt

3. Normal outfit (removed jarcket, medium hair ↔ long hair)

Remove black jacket from the 1. Normal outfit's prompt


4. Kimono outfit

prompt : 1girl, sakamata chloe, solo, grey hair, medium breasts, red eyes, japanese clothes, multicolored hair, hair ornament, cleavage, black hair, hair flower, streaked hair, kimono, bangs, white kimono, single hair bun, hair stick, chest sarashi, budget sarashi, fang, choker, tassel, thigh strap, wide sleeves, off shoulder

5. Bikini outfit (long hair ↔ medium hair)

prompt : 1girl, sakamata chloe, solo, medium breasts, navel, multicolored hair, red eyes, x hair ornament, black bikini, hair ornament, grey hair, streaked hair, black hair, braid, ear piercing, bangs, nail polish, hairclip, ahoge, string bikini, plaid bow, jewelry, long hair

6. Beltbra outfit (Red eyes ↔ Eye Mask)

prompt : 1girl, solo, sakamata chloe, red eyes, black fingerless gloves, grey hair, hair ornament, multicolored hair, streaked hair, cleavage, x hair ornament, black hair, black collar, large breasts, braid, medium hair, black jacket, plaid_bow, hood_up, long sleeves, off shoulder, (beltbra:1.2), black panties

I tried to make this as quality as possible, and I apologize for the length.


re-upload
